explanation: BTC is currently experiencing high bullish momentum, having broken through the 108k resistance and is approaching or potentially hitting new all-time highs (ATH). There are multiple confirmations from traders about profits being booked, targets being hit, and further upside expected. There is widespread FOMO (fear of missing out) and strong bullish sentiment. Technical signals from trading bots and analysts indicate continued upward movement with targets above 108k and up to 110k+. Some isolated bearish voices exist but are outnumbered by the positive sentiment, and even shorters express regret or caution. The market is volatile due to upcoming Powell speech and macro events, but the dominant short-term signal is strong buying, with discussions of holding, re-entry, and profit-taking on longs. Leverage suggestions from chat recommend 1:20 as safe, and this is echoed by repeated queries and confirmations in the chat.
